short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows digital GuidePosts from the sources you trust to guide you around the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GuidePost lets you view messages from content creators you trust to help guide you around the internet.

1) Install the extension
2) Select the content creators whose messages you would like to see
3) Encounter the digital GuidePosts they've place for you when surfing the internet

GuidePost lets you curate a "trust network" and presents their messages to you when you want them most.
